comment: Proven vaccines!Infection rate in vaccinated people in the UK is falling.Israel data shows benefits of the vaccinated versus non-vaccinated part of the population.There are good reasons for these worldwide numbers far: doses. vaccines. countries.
amr:
# ::snt Proven vaccines!Infection rate in vaccinated people in the UK is falling.Israel data shows benefits of the vaccinated versus non-vaccinated part of the population.There are good reasons for these worldwide numbers far: doses. vaccines. countries.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (v / vaccine
            :ARG1-of (p / prove-01)
            :mode expressive)
      :snt2 (f / fall-01
            :ARG1 (r / rate
                  :degree-of (ii / infect-01
                        :ARG1 (p2 / person
                              :ARG1-of (v2 / vaccinate-01)))
                  :location (c / country
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "UK"))))
      :snt3 (s / show-01
            :ARG0 (d / data
                  :source (c2 / country
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Israel")))
            :ARG1 (b / benefit-01
                  :ARG0 (c3 / contrast-01
                        :ARG1 (v3 / vaccinate-01
                              :ARG1 (p3 / part
                                    :part-of (p4 / population)
                                    :ARG1-of (v4 / vaccinate-01
                                          :polarity -)))
                        :ARG1 p3)))
      :snt4 (r2 / reason
            :ARG1-of (g / good-02)
            :topic (n3 / number
                  :mod (w / worldwide)
                  :mod (t / this))
            :mod (d2 / dose)
            :mod (v5 / vaccine)
            :mod (c4 / country)))

comment: The vaccines are proven. Just look at how the number of over aged people being admitted into hospital has fallen by over % in Israel. The stage trials were done concurrently. The number of vaxes administered is over million. There is so much to celebrate.
amr:
# ::snt The vaccines are proven. Just look at how the number of over aged people being admitted into hospital has fallen by over % in Israel. The stage trials were done concurrently. The number of vaxes administered is over million. There is so much to celebrate.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / prove-01
            :ARG1 (v / vaccine))
      :snt2 (l / look-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (f / fall-01
                  :ARG1 (n / number
                        :quant-of (p2 / person
                              :age (o / over)
                              :ARG1-of (a / admit-02
                                    :ARG2 (h / hospital))))
                  :ARG2 (o2 / over
                        :op1 (p3 / percentage-entity))
                  :location (c / country
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Israel")))
            :mod (j / just))
      :snt3 (t / try-02
            :mod (s / stage)
            :manner (c2 / concurrent))
      :snt4 (a2 / administer-01
            :ARG1 v
            :quant (o3 / over
                  :op1 1000000))
      :snt5 (m2 / much
            :degree (s2 / so)
            :ARG1-of (c3 / celebrate-02)))
